s0051: He ordered the sacrificial officials to manage it according to their methods, sacrificing beside the Jitai Great One altar.
s0052: Afterward, the imperial park had a white deer, made its hide into currency to announce auspicious omens, created white gold.
s0053: The next year, suburban sacrifice at Yong, obtained a one-horned beast, like a deer.
s0054: The officials said: 'Your Majesty reverently performed suburban sacrifice, the Supreme Thearch responded with favor, bestowed a one-horned beast, probably a qilin.'
s0055: Therefore offered it to the five altars, each altar added one cow for burnt offering.
s0056: Granted the lords white gold, to proclaim symbols responding in harmony with heaven and earth.
s0057: Therefore the King of Jibei, thinking the Son of Heaven would perform feng and shan, submitted a memorial offering Mount Tai and its neighboring counties.
s0058: The Son of Heaven accepted it, compensated with other counties.
s0059: The King of Changshan committed a crime, was demoted, the Son of Heaven enfeoffed his younger brother at Zhending to continue the former king's sacrifices, and made Changshan a commandery.
s0060: Then all five sacred peaks were in the Son of Heaven's commanderies.
s0061: Second year, the emperor began to build the Bright Hall, the Cypress Terrace, the Stone Canal, and the Altar of Heaven.
s0062: Third year, the emperor began to wear yellow robes, ride yellow carriages.
s0063: Fourth year, the emperor performed suburban sacrifice at Yong.
s0064: Fifth year, the emperor began to build the Ganquan Palace.
s0065: Sixth year, the emperor toured Yongzhou.
s0066: Seventh year, the emperor toured Yizhou.
s0067: Eighth year, the emperor toured Yanzhou.
s0068: Ninth year, the emperor toured Jingzhou.
s0069: Tenth year, the emperor toured Yangzhou.

s0071: Twelfth year, the emperor toured Xuzhou.
s0072: Thirteenth year, the emperor toured Youzhou.

s0078: Nineteenth year, the emperor toured Yanzhou.
s0079: Twentieth year, the emperor toured Jingzhou.

s0081: Twenty-second year, the emperor toured Qingzhou.
